item.title: Discovering Hugo
item.description: So I decided to go with the static website generator called Hugo for building my blog. My first impression is that it is a good static site generator so far. It is written in Go, and for what I used of it, it is quite fast. Being accustomed to PHP static site generators, having the hot-reload code generation being fast was quite surprising in a good way. Alas, there’s one issue: it runs code inside of comments.
